name: Space Pilot Alliance [Oculus Quest]
description:
tester version of Space Pilot Alliance.

Feedback/Bug reports on Discord please :) thanks for helping.
https://discord.gg/fZhfEn

*known issues

- frame drops/stutter in opening scene/menu. seems much better in the actual game...

- broken camera system after boarding/ejecting enemy ship. 

-broken grapple system if the ship you have boarded gets destroyed.

- menu options are mostly untested / 'fast' game mode is broken. medium speed seems to work...

- grappling hook collision problems, sometimes passes right through surfaces or pulls you inside meshes.

- tutorials are kind of a mess, and learning how the play the game properly is not obvious.

please play and offer feedback.

more S.P.A info, button mapping and tutorials at:

https://curiousvr.itch.io/space-pilot-defender
